For instance Ford Motors said last month it would lose some 20% of output for the first quarter of 2021. Other companies that have had to cut back, or even suspend production, include Honda, Toyota and Tesla. The fire was caused by plating equipment in one of the buildings due to a surge in current, destroyingÂ  600 square meters, including some 5% of the buildingâs clean room area. In a statement, Renesas confirmed there were no casualties caused by the fire, nor any leakages of toxic gases. It added that production in its adjacent N2 building, which houses a 200nm line, was not impacted. Early Monday, shares in Renesas slumped by nearly 6% on the Tokyo exchange.
